input_email_body:
Subject: Request for Support Regarding Possible Data Loss

A possible data loss in the Medication Database has been identified. Investigations are ongoing to determine whether the cause is due to unauthorized access or system vulnerabilities. Access logs have been reviewed and temporary security measures have been implemented, but the issue persists My name is David Kim.. We kindly request assistance in resolving the problem to ensure the security of sensitive patient data. You can reach me at sophia.rossi@service.it.
